group.name: Venue
group.table: select t.*, u.userName as createdByName from venue_log t inner join aci_user u on u.userId=t.createdBy
select t.*, v.venueLocation from venue_booking_record_log t inner join venue v on v.venueId=t.venueId inner join aci_user u on u.userId=t.createdBy

group.name: Trainee Absence
group.table: select t.*, tr.fullName, u.userName as createdByName, m.moduleCode as absence_moduleCode, m.moduleTitle as absence_moduleTitle, pb.projectCode as absence_projectCode, pb.batchCode as absence_batchCode, p.programmeCode as absence_programmeCode, p.programmeTitle as absence_programmeTitle, s.sessionDate as absence_sessionDate, s.sessionPeriod as absence_sessionPeriod, m1.moduleCode as makeup_moduleCode, m1.moduleTitle as makeup_moduleTitle, pb1.projectCode as makeup_projectCode, pb1.batchCode as makeup_batchCode, p1.programmeCode as makeup_programmeCode, p1.programmeTitle as makeup_programmeTitle, s1.sessionDate as makeup_sessionDate, s1.sessionPeriod as makeup_sessionPeriod from trainee_absence_record_log t inner join trainee tr on tr.traineeId=t.traineeId inner join batch_module bm on bm.batchModuleId=t.batchModuleId inner join module_structure m on m.moduleId=bm.moduleId inner join programme_batch pb on pb.programmeBatchId=bm.programmeBatchId inner join programme_structure p on p.programmeId=pb.programmeId inner join batchModule_session s on s.sessionId=t.sessionId inner join aci_user u on u.userId=t.createdBy left outer join batch_module bm1 on bm1.batchModuleId=t.insertedbatchModuleId left outer join module_structure m1 on m1.moduleId=bm1.moduleId left outer join programme_batch pb1 on pb1.programmeBatchId=bm1.programmeBatchId left outer join programme_structure p1 on p1.programmeId=pb1.programmeId left outer join batchModule_session s1 on s1.sessionId=t.insertedSessionId

select t.*, tr.fullName, u.userName as createdByName, m.moduleCode as absence_moduleCode, m.moduleTitle as absence_moduleTitle, pb.projectCode as absence_projectCode, pb.batchCode as absence_batchCode, p.programmeCode as absence_programmeCode, p.programmeTitle as absence_programmeTitle, s.sessionDate as absence_sessionDate, s.sessionPeriod as absence_sessionPeriod, m1.moduleCode as makeup_moduleCode, m1.moduleTitle as makeup_moduleTitle, pb1.projectCode as makeup_projectCode, pb1.batchCode as makeup_batchCode, p1.programmeCode as makeup_programmeCode, p1.programmeTitle as makeup_programmeTitle, s1.sessionDate as makeup_sessionDate, s1.sessionPeriod as makeup_sessionPeriod from trainee_absence_removed_log t inner join trainee tr on tr.traineeId=t.traineeId inner join batch_module bm on bm.batchModuleId=t.batchModuleId inner join module_structure m on m.moduleId=bm.moduleId inner join programme_batch pb on pb.programmeBatchId=bm.programmeBatchId inner join programme_structure p on p.programmeId=pb.programmeId inner join batchModule_session s on s.sessionId=t.sessionId inner join aci_user u on u.userId=t.createdBy left outer join batch_module bm1 on bm1.batchModuleId=t.insertedbatchModuleId left outer join module_structure m1 on m1.moduleId=bm1.moduleId left outer join programme_batch pb1 on pb1.programmeBatchId=bm1.programmeBatchId left outer join programme_structure p1 on p1.programmeId=pb1.programmeId left outer join batchModule_session s1 on s1.sessionId=t.insertedSessionId

group.name: Module
group.table: select t.*, u.userName as createdByName from module_structure_log t inner join aci_user u on u.userId=t.createdBy

group.name: Programme
group.table: select t.*, u.userName as createdByName, c1.codeValueDisplay as programmeLevelDesc, c2.codeValueDisplay as programmeCategoryDesc, c3.codeValueDisplay as programmeTypeDesc from programme_structure_log t inner join code_reference c1 on c1.codeValue=t.programmeLevel and c1.codeType='PGLVL' inner join code_reference c2 on c2.codeValue=t.programmeCategory and c2.codeType='PGCAT' inner join code_reference c3 on c3.codeValue=t.programmeType and c3.codeType='PGTYPE'inner join aci_user u on u.userId=t.createdBy
